word:
We have found that some things are not as they should be, and I have borne a decided testimony concerning the workings of a one-man power. I wrote a very decided testimony regarding the course of Elder Reaser, and read it to Elders Daniells, Irwin, Cottrell, -and a few others. A copy was sent to Elder Reaser, and I think he has decided to resign his position as president of the conference. 


                         -322- 

He has sown seed that will bear evil fruit. By his words and by his actions, he has disseminated doubts regarding the Testimonies.
